item.title: Questionable Ethics, Lambda Core [Crashes] Surface Tension [Glitch]
item.dc:creator: Mister_TBD
item.description:
Hey all,

First I would like to thank the team for making such an incredible game. The team did not just remake Half-Life, they placed their own twist on it as well.
I’ve experienced about 3-4 crashes while playing Black Mesa Source and have included the crash dumps in this thread.

Crashes:

Questionable Ethics: Hiding behind the desk during the final fight in the lobby caused the game crashed.

Lambda Core: Running to turn on pump # 2 without killing any of the vortigaunts caused the game to crash.

Surface Tension

Map Glitch

Specs

  • ASUS P8P67 DELUXE
  • GeForce GTX 560 Ti (Over Clocked)
  • Intel Core i7-2600K OC’ed @ 4.0Ghz
  • CORSAIR Enthusiast Series TX 650W
  • G.SKILL Ripjaws X Series 8GB OC’ed @ 2133Mhz
  • Western Digital Caviar Black 1TB 7200 RPM 64MB Cache SATA 6.0Gb/s (Steam Installation)
  • Corsair Force Series 3 60GB SSD (Windows Installation)
